Others: Jimmy Butler exited Friday's game between the Miami Heat and Denver Nuggets due to an ankle injury sustained in the first quarter.
Butler played only six minutes, scoring two points, assisting twice, and grabbing one rebound.
The Heat were trailing 40-27 at the end of the first quarter and lost 135-122 to the Nuggets.
Miami is now 3-5, with Butler's injury adding to their struggles.
The Heat's deep playoff runs have typically required Butler to be healthy.
